body:
Hi everyone.
Just wondering if anyone could help me edit a current texture pack I am using. I use currently Huahwi's Texture pack and all I wan't changed is the radical (Small cross in the middle of your screen). If someone could do that for me please leave your skype name below. I would really appreciate this!
NOTE: Incase you are wondering, yes I have tried to look on youtube how to edit resource packs but there is nothing for windows 8.
<3

title: Resource Packs

replies.body: I could try for you, my skype is cowsgomoomoomoo
